name: lazyman-ian
description: Development workflow and iOS/Swift plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: dev-flow
plugins.description: Unified development workflow: planning → coding → commit → PR → release with VDD and cross-platform team orchestration

plugins.name: ios-swift-plugin
plugins.description: iOS/Swift development toolkit: SwiftUI, Swift Concurrency, WidgetKit, performance optimization

plugins.name: utils
plugins.description: Code quality tools: deslop, search-code, tool-enforcer, context-warning, loop detection

plugins.name: research
plugins.description: Research tools: Perplexity AI, Braintrust analysis, RepoPrompt, token-analyzer, session summary
